about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: This sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This sign means: | This sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign tells drivers to prepare to allow traffic to safely merge from the right.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign tells drivers to prepare to allow traffic to safely merge from the right.

comment.text: This sign means: | Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign tells drivers to prepare to allow traffic to safely merge from the right.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: This sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions

hasPart.name: When driving in a construction zone:

about.name: When driving in a construction zone:

hasPart.assesses: When driving in a construction zone: | When driving in a construction zone: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You may encounter unexpected conditions in a construction zone. For the safety of yourself, other drivers, and construction workers, drive with extraordinary caution.

suggestedAnswer.text: Expect construction workers to yield to motorists.

comment.text: Expect construction workers to yield to motorists.

answerExplanation.text: You may encounter unexpected conditions in a construction zone. For the safety of yourself, other drivers, and construction workers, drive with extraordinary caution.

hasPart.name: If you hit an animal with your vehicle while driving on a California highway, you should:

about.name: If you hit an animal with your vehicle while driving on a California highway, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If you hit an animal with your vehicle while driving on a California highway, you should: | If you hit an animal with your vehicle while driving on a California highway, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you injure or kill an animal on the roadway, you should call CHP, the nearest humane society, or the police. You should not leave the animal to die or try to move the animal.

suggestedAnswer.text: Move the injured animal off the road.

comment.text: Move the injured animal off the road.

answerExplanation.text: If you injure or kill an animal on the roadway, you should call CHP, the nearest humane society, or the police. You should not leave the animal to die or try to move the animal.

comment.text: If you hit an animal with your vehicle while driving on a California highway, you should: | If you injure or kill an animal on the roadway, you should call CHP, the nearest humane society, or the police. You should not leave the animal to die or try to move the animal.

hasPart.name: In which of the following scenarios should your wheels not be pointed straight ahead?

about.name: In which of the following scenarios should your wheels not be pointed straight ahead?

hasPart.assesses: In which of the following scenarios should your wheels not be pointed straight ahead? | In which of the following scenarios should your wheels not be pointed straight ahead? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: While waiting to turn left, keep your wheels pointed straight ahead until it is safe to start your turn. If a vehicle hits you from behind, this will prevent you from veering into oncoming traffic. When parked facing either uphill or downhill, turn the wheels so the vehicle will not roll into traffic if the brakes fail.

suggestedAnswer.text: When waiting to make a left turn at a traffic light.

comment.text: When waiting to make a left turn at a traffic light.

suggestedAnswer.text: When parked on a hill or sloping driveway.

comment.text: When parked on a hill or sloping driveway.

suggestedAnswer.text: When parked on the side of a level roadway where there is no curb.

comment.text: When parked on the side of a level roadway where there is no curb.

acceptedAnswer.text: When parked on a hill or sloping driveway.

comment.text: When parked on a hill or sloping driveway.

answerExplanation.text: While waiting to turn left, keep your wheels pointed straight ahead until it is safe to start your turn. If a vehicle hits you from behind, this will prevent you from veering into oncoming traffic. When parked facing either uphill or downhill, turn the wheels so the vehicle will not roll into traffic if the brakes fail.

comment.text: In which of the following scenarios should your wheels not be pointed straight ahead? | While waiting to turn left, keep your wheels pointed straight ahead until it is safe to start your turn. If a vehicle hits you from behind, this will prevent you from veering into oncoming traffic. When parked facing either uphill or downhill, turn the wheels so the vehicle will not roll into traffic if the brakes fail.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: In which of the following scenarios should your wheels not be pointed straight ahead? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
educationalAlignment.targetName: In which of the following scenarios should your wheels not be pointed straight ahead?

hasPart.name: The maximum posted speed limit should be driven only:

about.name: The maximum posted speed limit should be driven only:

hasPart.assesses: The maximum posted speed limit should be driven only: | The maximum posted speed limit should be driven only: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: The posted maximum speed limit is the fastest legal speed you can travel on a road under ideal conditions. It is safest to drive at the same speed as surrounding traffic, up to the maximum speed limit. Maintaining a safe speed at all times is a responsibility shared by all motorists.

answerExplanation.text: The posted maximum speed limit is the fastest legal speed you can travel on a road under ideal conditions. It is safest to drive at the same speed as surrounding traffic, up to the maximum speed limit. Maintaining a safe speed at all times is a responsibility shared by all motorists.

comment.text: The maximum posted speed limit should be driven only: | The posted maximum speed limit is the fastest legal speed you can travel on a road under ideal conditions. It is safest to drive at the same speed as surrounding traffic, up to the maximum speed limit. Maintaining a safe speed at all times is a responsibility shared by all motorists.

hasPart.name: Regulatory signs are:
hasPart.assesses: Regulatory signs are: | Regulatory signs are: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Regulatory signs inform drivers of specific laws that must be obeyed. Displayed laws may be about traffic direction, lane use, turning, speed, parking, or special situations. Regulatory signs are commonly white squares or rectangles with black, red, or green letters or symbols.

answerExplanation.text: Regulatory signs inform drivers of specific laws that must be obeyed. Displayed laws may be about traffic direction, lane use, turning, speed, parking, or special situations. Regulatory signs are commonly white squares or rectangles with black, red, or green letters or symbols.

comment.text: Regulatory signs are: | Regulatory signs inform drivers of specific laws that must be obeyed. Displayed laws may be about traffic direction, lane use, turning, speed, parking, or special situations. Regulatory signs are commonly white squares or rectangles with black, red, or green letters or symbols.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: Regulatory signs are: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
